data.message: Actually it sucks, thanks for asking.

replies.message: (Y) (Y) sucks :)  P.S.FB did you like answer :D
Hate it
LMAO!!!
SUCKS!!
hahahaha plain and simple to understand FB!
i hate it
I want the latest news not whatever................
Actually, I don't believe they were asking anything, just making a statement...they really could care less about any of our opinions.
Bob Marshall...."HA"  !! True....
Hate It!
its sucks
i want to get it back plllllllllllllz
so, what's wrong with it people?  Looks good to me.
I cannot view my entire newsfeed.  :(

I can't wait until a better site overtakes you, after passing our information around and silencing relationships between friends--not to mention how you have no customer service at all banning good people and letting abusive people crow all night long.  You become more and more irrelevant.  This is a slower replay of what happened w/ MySpace.  Keep it up!  I can't wait for you to hang yourself, figuratively...

well the only problem i have wth it is the fact that for some reason i have noticed that a friend will disappear off my friend list knowing the friend did not delete me and then a few days later the friend will pop back up and in the meantime i can still see the same friend in my messenger. So what's up with that??????
how do i click for my top stories and most recent
Thanks for your question, Wanda. Learn how to adjust your News Feed in the Help Center here: http://on.fb.me/1evlcWH -Leigh
I HATE CHANGE
Facebook what was the main reason for the change? Please be honest because it's not appealing at all.

" Learn how to adjust your News Feed in the Help Center here"

ya, but will the change stick finally? i am sick of having to change it back to most recent every couple days.
That's Funny! Thanks you made me laugh.
I hate how you keep making changes with out caring how we feel at all so why even ask now?????
They didn't ask, Nancy...  They just said that they hope you like it :P

Yes I liked that.Its look better.The signs (comment,like etc) are as like as “We Chat”.So cute and looks smooth too.
I heard that facebook and we chat are going to be one? O.o 
Are the changes for that?
